name: (Not) Space Invaders
description:
A game I made from the first half of Unity's Create with Code course (also the first Unity game I have made).

It is a simple arcade shooter reminiscent of Space Invaders.

All game logic was programmed by me. All assets used are from the Unity Asset Store.

Controls:

  • Left and Right Arrow keys to rotate the turret
  • Space bar to shoot

Github Repo: https://github.com/Xalph555/Unity-Create-With-Code-Project
